# Calculinux Project Vocabulary - Rejected Terms
#
# For more information on the vocabulary file format, see:
# https://vale.sh/docs/keys/vocab#file-format
#
# This file supports regex patterns for more advanced matching:
# https://vale.sh/docs/guides/regex
#
# Use this file to explicitly flag words/patterns that should NOT be used
# in documentation. Vale will flag these as errors.
#
# Examples:
#   (?i)MongoDB       - case-insensitive match
#   [Oo]bservability  - character class alternative
